token_info.name: Life Penalty
token_info.description: In this mini-game, the viewer's Tezos address determines whether one is a winner or a loser. Winners (10% of the total) will always score a goal; losers will fail forever. This NFT reflects on the systemic inequalities embedded in our society. The interactive aspect of this game represents the illusion of agency and control over your actions. Despite what the "voice" says, the success in this game is pre-programmed and is not under your control.
